title: BRIEF-Western Forest Products Says USW Withdrew From Mediation With Co & Independent Mediators After Few Hours Of Talks On Sept 13
text:
BRIEF-Western Forest Products Says USW Withdrew From Mediation With Co & Independent Mediators After Few Hours Of Talks On Sept 13

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 14, 2019 19:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Western Forest Products Says USW Withdrew From Mediation With Co & Independent Mediators After Few Hours Of Talks On Sept 13 Sept 14 (Reuters) - Western Forest Products Inc : * WESTERN FOREST PRODUCTS - USW WITHDREW FROM MEDIATION WITH CO & INDEPENDENT MEDIATORS VINCE READY & AMANDA ROGERS AFTER FEW HOURS OF TALKS ON SEPT 13 * WESTERN FOREST PRODUCTS - MEDIATORS INFORMED CO THAT USW HAD LEFT, AND WOULD NOT BE RETURNING FOR TALKS, SCHEDULED FOR FULL DAY ON SEPTEMBER 14, 2019 * WESTERN FOREST PRODUCTS INC SAYS STRIKE AFFECTS ALL COMPANY'S USW CERTIFIED MANUFACTURING AND TIMBERLANDS OPERATIONS IN BRITISH COLUMBIA

BRIEF-Western Forest Products Says USW Withdrew From Mediation With Co & Independent Mediators After Few Hours Of Talks On Sept 13
description: BRIEF-Western Forest Products Says USW Withdrew From Mediation With Co & Independent Mediators After Few Hours Of Talks On Sept 13
